function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spillover effects between neighboring districts leading to a containment effect on neighboring regions","Impact":"Increased risk of cross-regional transmission of infections","Mitigation":"Detailed analysis and research on the ecological pathways of COVID-19 transmission","Technologies":"Spatial models and empirical investigation","People":"Residents of neighboring districts","Owner":"Research institutions and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Export of infections across regional borders","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 to neighboring regions","Mitigation":"Detailed analysis and research on the spillover effects at a smaller regional scale","Technologies":"Empirical investigation and statistical modeling","People":"Residents of neighboring districts","Owner":"Research institutions and public health authorities"}]}
